can actually run the GUI - who cares though. There are a number of different GUI wrappers.
y, move to new spot, p
Insert test at end of line
Begin new line below the cursor
Begin new line above the cursor
and insert its output below the cursor
Delete to beginning of a line
Delete to end of a line
Copy current line into storage buffer
These are a few of the more advanced things.
